h3_title: Secret - Defeat the Stone Vanguard with the Shigandang
content: It’s not a bad idea to use the Azure Dust Transformation on him too, as your Rock Guai form can take the damage be dishes out and build up Might, and then perform a Rockfall attack to hit him for massive damage and stagger him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Shigandang.md', within the main section titled 'Shigandang', specifically from the subsection 'Shigandang Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'Secret - Defeat the Stone Vanguard with the Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
It’s not a bad idea to use the Azure Dust Transformation on him too, as your Rock Guai form can take the damage be dishes out and build up Might, and then perform a Rockfall attack to hit him for massive damage and stagger him.
